SNOW LIKELY
SNOW ACCUMULATION AROUND AN INCH
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 16
NORTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW 70 PERCENT

SNOW
SNOW MAY BE HEAVY AT TIMES IN THE EVENING
STORM TOTAL SNOW ACCUMULATION OF 4 TO 8 INCHES

SUNNY

WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 6 BELOW IN THE MORNING
